---

### Invitation to Tender #23587-230439/A

#### Notice Title

* English: Invitation to Tender for DJI Matrice 300 RTK DRONE Services
* French: Invitation à soumissionner pour services de drones Matrice 300 RTK de DJI

#### Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: 23587-230439/A
* Publication Date: December 26, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: February 1, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* Amendments: None

#### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Trade Agreements: WTO GPA, CETA, CFTA, UK-Canada Trade Continuity Agreement, and CPTPP
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Requirement Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of Natural Resources Canada, invites bids for the acquisition of DJI Matrice 300 RTK drone services, including the following items:
1. DJI Matrice 300 RTK drone
2. DJI TB60 battery
3. Intelligent Battery Station (BS60) for TB60
4. Zenmuse L1
5. DJI Terra Pro software for one year

#### Delivery Details

* The requirement is subject to the provisions of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
* Delivery date: March 30, 2023

#### Instructions to Bidders

* Bidders must refer to Part 2 of the bid solicitation for instructions on bidder requirements and Part 3 for bid preparation instructions.
* Electronic submissions are allowed through the epost Connect service of Canada Post Corporation.
* Bidders are required to submit a responsive bid that meets all the requirements of the bid solicitation to be considered for award.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Edmond Egikian, Public Works and Government Services Canada, at (819) 420-4201 or edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

Note: To access the bid solicitation documents, please visit the Canada Buys website at <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/f95ec9d2239319278d39a45da70e19f9/ABES.PROD.PW_CAG
